nodes.documentation:
@title DydxPoolController
@dev This library handles deposits to and withdrawals from dYdX liquidity pools.
nodes.name: KeeperDaoPoolController

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the fund's balance in the KeeperDAO pool.
nodes.name: getBalance
approve

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (function (address,uint256) payable external returns (uint256))

nodes.name: deposit
withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev Withdraws all funds from the KeeperDAO pool.
@return Boolean indicating success.
nodes.name: withdrawAll

nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculates an amount of kEther to withdraw equivalent to amount parameter in ETH.
@return amount to withdraw in kEther.
nodes.name: calculatekEtherWithdrawAmount
